description.en: A quiet、 yet determined summoner who guides the spirits of the dead to the Farplane. On her pilgrimage to defeat Sin、 she encounters Tidus、 a young man from another world whom she welcomes as her new guardian. Though at times it seems as though they are on a hopeless journey of doubt and loss、 they at least have each other.
description.jp:
「異界送り」で死者の魂を鎮め 世界を
襲う巨大な魔物「シン」を倒すべく各地
を巡る「召喚士」の少女。人々の期待を
一身に背負う。召喚士を守る「ガード」
役に 異世界から来た青年ティーダを招
き 共に苦難を乗り越えた。おっとりし
た性格だが 強い意思を持つ。

desc.en:
Summons [Valefor] for 6 turns
Triggers [Energy Blast]:
• 10-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + single target HP attack
• Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• Grants [Valefor's Blessing] for 6 turns

While [Valefor] is active:
• [Grand Summon] becomes [Energy Blast]
• [BRV Attack] becomes [Sonic Wings]
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] becomes [Energy Ray]
• When [Energy Blast] is used, [Valefor] count is refreshed to 6 turns

[Valefor's Blessing] has the following effects:
• Raises Max BRV and Attack
• Grants party BRV regen

[Sonic Wings] has the following effects:
• Raises BRV based on Initial BRV
• Deals a 2-HIT magic BRV+HP attack

[Energy Ray] has the following effects:
• Raises BRV based on Attack
• Deals a 2-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies
desc.gl: Self: 6 turns special effect Valefor\nTriggers additional Energy Blast (10-hit group magic BRV attack + single-target HP attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; self: 6 turns Valefor's Favor)\nBecomes Energy Blast, BRV Attack becomes Sonic Wings, HP Attack, HP Attack+ become Energy Ray while special effect Valefor active
desc.jp:
自身に6ACTION特殊効果「ヴァルファーレ」付与し
以下の「シューティング・パワー」が追加発動
10HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
自身に6ACTION「ヴァルファーレの加護」付与
特殊効果「ヴァルファーレ」付与中
「シューティング・パワー」に
通常「BRV攻撃」が
「ソニックウィング」に
通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が
「シューティング・レイ」に変化
